%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId} DELETE 删除一个Alternative

=/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId} DELETE=

==功能 ==
删除一个候选方案 `Alternative`

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}

==HTTP请求方式==
DELETE

==请求类型==
无

==请求参数==
* 路径参数
| 参数名        | 值     | 描述                                       |
|---------------|--------|--------------------------------------------|
| experimentId  | String | 要删除的 `Alternative` 所属的 `Experiment` |
| alternativeId | String | 要删除的 `Alternative`                     |


==返回结果==
| 状态 | 结果     |
|------|----------|
| 200  | 删除成功 |

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -v -X delete  https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}
  }}}
